Name: ForgePaw
Description: Hailing from the pixelated plains of the WebtrES club, ForgePaw stands out with its sleek shiny black box and the unique cat button features that glow with an uncanny feline grace. Known as the artisan of the digital realm, this character was once a central processing unit in a high-tech foundry, controlling the creation of countless gadgets with its foundry-themed arms and legs. After a freak electrical storm, ForgePaw gained sentience and a laser screen gaze that cuts through the virtual fog like a beacon. Now, armed with a hammer in one hand and a soldering torch in the other, ForgePaw crafts not just circuitry, but also the destiny of its own story, one pixel at a time.
